features.card2_text1: No need to carry your own power bank.
features.card2_text2_line1: We are always ready to support you everywhere –
features.card2_text2_line2: from coffee shops to shopping malls.

why_choose.title: CONVENIENT ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
why_choose.description_line1: Sac Luon is a smart power bank rental network,
why_choose.description_line2: helping you stay connected without interruption.
why_choose.description_line3: Just scan the QR code, take the charger, and return it anywhere.
why_choose.feature2: Smart charging stations widely covered across Vietnam
why_choose.feature3: Flexible payment via e-wallets or bank cards

how_to_use.subtitle: OPERATING PROCESS
how_to_use.title: EASY TO USE
how_to_use.step1_desc: Open the Sac Luon app or scan the QR code to locate charging stations around you.
how_to_use.step2_title: SCAN AND GET THE POWER BANK
how_to_use.step2_desc: Scan the QR code on the station, and the power bank automatically pops out – ready to use immediately.
how_to_use.step3_desc_line1: Return the power bank at any station in the system.
how_to_use.step3_desc_line2: The system automatically records the return and processes payment.

outstanding_features.subtitle: Outstanding Features
outstanding_features.feature1_desc: quick battery charge in just 30 minutes.
outstanding_features.feature2_desc: compatible with all charging standards: iPhone, Android, Type-C, etc.
outstanding_features.feature3_desc: pick up and return the power bank at any station in the system.
outstanding_features.feature4_desc: transparent transaction tracking, power banks undergo regular inspection.

core_values.subtitle: CORE VALUES
core_values.value_point1: We believe that the power bank is not just an energy source, but also a bridge that helps people stay connected to the world.
core_values.value_point2_line1: Sac Luon aims to create a smart, friendly, and sustainable energy ecosystem –
core_values.value_point2_line2: so that every moment of yours is always powered up.

Footer.address_line1: 2nd Floor – No. 5, Alley 76 Tran Thai Tong,
Footer.address_line2: Dich Vong Hau Ward, Cau Giay District, Hanoi
